p: Three nigellothionins (NsW1, NsW2, and NsW4) isolated from N. sativa seeds were tested against conditionally pathogenic Aspergillus strains to reveal their antifungal activity ( Table 2). All thionins tested have a comparative antifungal activity towards three of four fungal species ( Aspergillus flavus 3K, A. fumigatus 2K, and A. oryzae 1K).
